Social¶

Scrape and analyze data from various social media platforms

Instagram¶

Instagram(username) Scrape the data of an Instagram User
download_instagram_by_shortcode(shortcode) Download a post from its shortcode

VSCO¶

VSCO(username) Scrape the data of a VSCO user
